item.title: Learning Spatial Stats: Day One
item.description: Reading “Analyzing spatio-temporal data with R: Everything you always wanted to know – but were afraid to ask” Beginning my spatial statistical learning by reading Analyzing spatio-temporal data with R: Everything you always wanted to know – but were afraid to ask You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.
